body: 不看后篇社保 看到最后萎了

@rufferty I doubt she'll kill him though. I take it she's gone full Yandere now and wanted to get rid of her "competition" so she can have him all to herself. I think she wanted to get rid of the girl and replace her, and he'd never find out, too bad he suspected her already so now she has to go into the "taking him by force" stage of yanderehood. Would have been better for him had he just not been suspicious and didn't follow, he would have never known. Though it would mean no matter what she would "ALWAYS" be his girlfriend, replacing any girl he gets together with if she has to.
rufferty, I'm pretty sure slime absorbed the other girl.
这个系列有意思，细思恐极（鸡儿yyd）

Yup, he’s fucked.  Not in a good way either.  I’m curious though, it looked like both girls from the third chapter that were walking along and then into the alleyway- it looked like they were both the slime girl ... is that right?
